name: SKELEKING
description:
In a whimsical world filled with peaceful spirits and creatures of all shapes and colors, death is nobody's concern. Yet change is soon to come.

After centuries of slumber, Skeleking arises from the underworld to rule once again. Weak and forgotten, he'll suck the life from nature and turn mangled corpses of his fallen foes into loyal soldiers one by one. With his regained powers and a fearsome army, Skeleking will defeat gods and lay waste to everything that stands before him!
